ly.priv.mobile

Class TwitterHelperMethods

  • java.lang.Object
    • ly.priv.mobile.TwitterHelperMethods

  • public class TwitterHelperMethods
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides access to methods required by the TwitterLinkGrabberService
    Author:
    Shivam Verma

    • Method Detail

      • setTwitterUserLoggedInStatus

        public static void setTwitterUserLoggedInStatus(Context context,
                                java.lang.Boolean status)
        Saves the login status of a twitter user into SharedPreferences. Example :

        To Logout a user : TwitterHelperMethods.setTwitterUserLoggedInStatus(getApplicationContext (), false);

        Parameters:
        {Context} - context Context of the calling Activity
        {Boolean} - status Logged in status to be set.

      • isTwitterUserLoggedIn

        public static java.lang.Boolean isTwitterUserLoggedIn(Context context)
        Returns the login status of a twitter user.
        Parameters:
        {Context} - context Context of the calling Activity
        Returns:
        {Boolean}

      • saveTwitterAccessTokenValues

        public static java.lang.Boolean saveTwitterAccessTokenValues(Context context,
                                             java.lang.String token,
                                             java.lang.String tokenSecret)
        Save the twitter access token and token secret values to SharedPreferences
        Parameters:
        {Context} - context Context of the Calling Activit
        {String} - token Token value fetched after making a request to the twitter api.
        {String} - tokenSecret Token Secret value fetched after making a request to twitter api.
        Returns:

      • getTwitterToken

        Returns:

        Returns:
        {String} Token secret string
